左乐：此次前赴大荒城，有博士协助，想必路途会轻松不少.Translation: Zuo Le: This time, heading to the Great Wasteland City with the doctor's assistance will surely make the journey much easier.

左乐:博士，前方道路开放还有20s.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the road ahead will open in 20 seconds.

左乐:山洞的入口还需要30s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: The entrance to the cave needs another 30 seconds to open.

左乐:博士，前方的道路还有20s清理，这里的藤蔓可以攀爬，注意脚下.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the road ahead will take 20 seconds to clear. The vines here can be climbed; watch your step.

左乐:博士，山洞的出口还需要30s清理.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the exit of the cave still needs 30 seconds to clear.

左乐:博士，前面就是大荒城了，道路还有30s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the Great Wasteland City is just ahead. The road will open in 30 seconds.
